original_text: Now the house of David was told, “Aram has allied itself with Ephraim”; so the hearts of Ahaz and his people were shaken, as the trees of the forest are shaken by the wind.
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 다윗의 집에 알려 이르되 아람이 에브라임과 동맹하였다 하였으므로 왕의 마음과 그의 백성의 마음이 숲이 바람에 흔들림 같이 흔들렸더라

sentences.original_text: Now the house of David was told
so the hearts of Ahaz and his people were shaken
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 아하스와 그의 백성들의 마음이 흔들렸다

sentences.original_text: as the trees of the forest are shaken by the wind
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 숲의 나무들이 바람에 흔들리는 것처럼
